unnormalised: The gig economy presents both opportunities and challenges for HR in India. Managing compliance (PF, ESIC) becomes complex for organizations like TCS. Benefits for gig workers must be re-evaluated, especially around healthcare. Skill development initiatives like NSDC are crucial for "Atmanirbhar Bharat". We need robust policies by 26/01/2025. Employee engagement strategies also need a revamp by 01/04/2024. The implications of this trend on the "permanent" workforce must be analyzed by 31/12/2024. Impact of freelance work for employees in Hyderabad needs a deeper look.
